titles: The case of mixt communion whether it be lawful to separate from a church upon the account of promiscuous congregations and mixt communions?
author: Freeman, Samuel, 1643-1700.
publisher: Printed for T. Basset ... B. Tooke ... and F. Gardiner ...,
notes: Written by Samuel Freeman.  Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
keywords: Lord's Supper --  Church of England --  Early works to 1800.
